FuncDef: This command displays multicast path management channel related information.
CLIs: channel [ router <router-instance> | vpls <service-id> | service-name <service-name> ] [ <fp> <slot-number> [ </fp-number> ] ] [ group <ip-address> [ source <ip-address> ] ] [ path <path-type> ] [ detail ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing VPLS service ID. Values-1 to 214748364.
Displays information for the specified card slot.
Specifies the path type. Values-primary, secondary.
